ModMetaData.name: Unofficial Chemfuel Expanded (Continued)
ModMetaData.author: Zaljerem
ModMetaData.description:
Original mod by Fullhammer https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2806793401 If the original author requests it, I will remove this update.
--
Original mod notes (1.3):
"Vanilla Chemfuel Expanded is a small mod created to showcase what the new Pipe network code is capable of" (c)
Unofficial Chemfuel Expanded is focused on making the original mod wider, and to develop ways to use the piping system for your petrol town. Chemstove, Chemsmelter, Chemsmithing, Chemcrematorium, ability to refine chemfuel to neutroamine and then your useless neutroamine into synth-hypertextiles.
I know about Rimefeller, but i like how VCE works.
